description: The practice involves swishing oil around in your mouth to remove bacteria, which can turn into plaque and cause your teeth to look yellow.
Urologist, Andrologist & Uro-Oncologist Chief Consultant & Head of the Dept. of Urology,Honorary Professor, Ex. Urological Surgeon
Dr. Jahangir Alam graduated from Dhaka Medical College under the University of Dhaka. Like most other Bangladeshi medical professionals.
Prof. Dr. Md. Abu Bakar passed MBBS from Sher-e-Bangla Medical College and completed FCPS degree in Internal Medicine from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons (BCPS).
He got advanced training in oral cancer surgery and reconstruction from University of Peradeniya, Kandy, Sri Lanka as JICA Fellowship (Japan); Dental Implant from Boston, USA.
doctor: A. Professor Dr. S. M. Anwar Sadat

description: Prof. Dr. Sultana Razia Begum graduated from Mymenshingh Medical College and secured 2nd position with Honors in Surgery and Obstetrics and Gynecology.
